long_description: Before you take to the trail this summer you'll want to check out the feature-rich Mountain Hardwear Portino shorts. The smart design and durable construction will keep you moving along in comfort. Rugged nylon canvas has a Durable Water Repellent finish to help fend off moisture and stains. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hand pockets, rear pockets and zippered thigh pockets provide ample space for your pocket knife, energy bars and other essentials; hidden zippered pocket includes a key clip. Double fabric panel at the seat stands up to abrasion encountered on the trail. Mountain Hardwear Portino shorts have an integrated belt that allows easy, 1-handed adjustments.
